DOC.detailed_description: Patient enrollment electroencephalographic ( EEG ) clinical data collection stop May 2009 . Data analysis ongoing , result describe ( O'Reilly D , Navakatikyan MA , Filip M , Greene D , Van Marter LJ . Peak Peak Amplitude Neonatal Brain Monitoring Premature Infants . Clin Neurophysiol 2012 May 16 ) , via publication peer-reviewed journal . Another manuscript complete undergoing revision resubmission . We anticipate several additional article complete data collect study . There relationship industry current funding study . We maintain institutional review board approval due ongoing data analysis .
